tool_description: Extracts and structures key information from volunteer application forms and documents into standardized fields for further processing.

application_text.description: Raw text content from the volunteer application form

application_format.description: Format of the application (pdf, word, web_form, handwritten)

organization_code.description: Unique identifier for the volunteer organization

error_messages: Invalid application format: Use one of [pdf, word, web_form, handwritten]
Empty application text: Provide non-empty application content
Organization code not found: Provide a valid organization identifier
usage: Provide the raw application content, specify the format type, and include the organization code to extract structured applicant information.

applicant_id.description: Generated unique identifier for the applicant

contact_info.description: Phone numbers, email addresses, and mailing address

experience_years.description: Years of relevant volunteer or work experience

skills.description: List of relevant skills and qualifications
